Package dev.blu.model.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileActionConfiguration  
    FileActionThread
    Thread that runs a FileAction
    FileCipher
    Class that contains file encryption/decryption methods
    FileConfiguration
    Describes the File that is going to be processed or is being processed in a FileAction
    FileDecryptor
    Decrypts a given file with the given password
    FileEncryptAndSplit
    A composite FileAction that uses FileEncryptor and FileSplitterByMaxSize to perform an encrypted division of a File
    FileEncryptor
    Encrypts a given file with the given password
    FileMergeAndDecrypt
    A composite FileAction that uses FileEncryptor and FileSplitterByMaxSize to perform an encrypted division of a File
    FileMerger
    Merge the partitions of a file together and rebuilds the original file
    FileSplitterByMaxSize
    Splits a file in parts with a maximum size for each part
    FileSplitterByPartNumber
    Splits a file in the specified number of parts
